name: Dominoes (itch)
description:
This was a school project made over the span of a small week. Currently there is no sound, so please put some of your favourite music on to make the game more enjoyable.

Topple dominoes, make domino paths, hit buttons and solve puzzles.
Try to beat all 10 levels!

Controls:
Scroll wheel rotates a domino
Left click to place one down
Right click to topple on white surfaces (dominoes topple to the side that's purple)
Middle click to delete a domino

made with Unity (and love) by papercookies -- papercookies.itch.io
